item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-17
item.description: Twitter lets you tip creators with Ethereum (1 minute read) Twitter is expanding its tipping options to include Ethereum.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-02-11
item.description: Samsung Unveils Crypto Wallet and Storage on New S22 Smartphone (2 minute read) Samsung unveiled Samsung Wallet along with its new Galaxy devices at its Unpacked 2022 event.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-26
item.description: Etherscan Creators Launch ‘Ethereum Instant Messenger’ Blockscan Chat (2 minute read) The Blockscan Chat beta is now live.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-13
item.description: Coinbase Acquiring Derivatives Exchange, Bitcoin Futures Trading to Follow (2 minute read) Coinbase has announced that it will acquire derivatives exchange FairX to offer derivatives to all Coinbase customers in the US.
